thread.title: Fed raises rates, signals confidence in strengthening economy

title: Fed raises rates, signals confidence in strengthening economy
text: March 21, 2018 / 6:28 PM / Updated 15 hours ago Fed raises rates, signals confidence in strengthening economy Reuters Staff 15 Min Read NEW YORK (Reuters) - The Federal Reserve raised interest rates on Wednesday and forecast at least two more hikes for 2018, signaling growing confidence U.S. tax cuts and government spending will boost the economy and inflation and lead to more aggressive future tightening. The Federal Reserve headquarters in Washington September 16 2015. REUTERS/Kevin Lamarque Policymakers predicted rates would rise three times next year and two times in 2020, a further indication of confidence in the economy.
